articles.author: Ray Sanchez and Peter Nickeas, CNN
articles.title: What we learned from the Uvalde shooting video, and what remains unknown
articles.description: The video of law enforcement response to the Robb Elementary School shooting sheds no light on why officers waited so long to confront the gunman, nor does it reveal who was responsible for the delay. In fact, the video raises more questions than answers.

articles.title: Steve Bannon's 'War Room' footage shows spread of conspiracy theories ahead of January 6th - CNN Video
articles.description: Steve Bannon, who was intricately involved in planning challenges to the 2020 election, faces contempt of Congress charges on Monday after failing to cooperate with the January 6th committee. CNN's Drew Griffin provides insight to the key role Bannon played i…

articles.title: Conway predicts Trump will run again. Hear who he thinks can beat him - CNN Video
articles.description: Conservative attorney George Conway, who is now a fierce critic of former President Donald Trump, predicts that Trump will run for president again and says Ron DeSantis may be the only candidate that can beat him one-on-one.

articles.author: Jamiel Lynch, Rebekah Riess
articles.title: Dust storm causes a 21-vehicle pileup in Montana, killing six
articles.description: A dust storm caused a 21-vehicle pileup on Interstate 90 in Big Horn County, Montana, on Friday evening, resulting in six fatalities, according to the Montana Highway Patrol.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ivana Trump's death ruled accidental by medical examiner
articles.description: Ivana Trump, an ex-wife of former President Donald Trump, died of "blunt impact injuries" to the torso, New York City's medical examiner said Friday.

articles.author: Holmes Lybrand and Hannah Rabinowitz, CNN
articles.title: DOJ wants the first US Capitol rioter convicted by jury to serve 15 years
articles.description: Prosecutors want the first US Capitol rioter convicted by a jury to spend 15 years behind bars -- nearly a decade longer than the most severe sentence a rioter has received so far.

articles.title: John Eastman loses emergency request to protect his phone data from DOJ investigators
articles.description: A federal judge in New Mexico won't step in to protect Trump attorney John Eastman's seized cell phone from Justice Department investigators, after Eastman was searched as part of a January 6-related criminal inquiry.
